If this were in itâ€™s prime time? I would have recommended this game. My friend and I used to play this for hours on end when I had it on console, and when I moved to Steam we continued to do so for a little bit. The game has lost its charm, and itâ€™s developers are completely disconnected from their playerbase. It's one of those games you have a love/hate relationship with, but continue to play it.

If youâ€™re playing killer or even survivor, my recommendation is to make sure to hide the in-game chat and set your steam profile to private. A lot of people within this community are overly argumentative and will go out of their way to comment abuse on your steam profile or in-game chat. 

The developers report system does absolutely nothing, despite I had proof of someone spewing homophobic insults at me and telling me to take my own life, no action was taken. 

The developers also keep releasing low quality content that doesnâ€™t reflect the playerbase it has. Claire Redfieldâ€™s face is a perfect example, someone actually looked at that and thought â€˜yes, we will release this to our customers. Good enoughâ€™. 

The developers are slow at releasing QOL improvements. They waited years before releasing a tutorial, and are now only just implementing changes that should have been in the game many years ago. They are only just deciding to rework meta perks after min-maxers optimised the fun out of the game.
cant say nigga in chat do not recommend

[h1]Lots of blood, lots of fun.[/h1]
[b] [Pay-to-Play], Kill or get killed. [/b]
[hr][/hr]
I'm becoming addicted to this game.
It's a lot of fun, even as a survivor. I was scared playing as a survivor wouldn't be as much fun as being a killer, but I think both roles are fun to play. This game is brutal, contains a lot of original (as well as copyrighted) killers and survivors, so I'd definitely recommend it.
[hr][/hr]

I have 4 hours of playtime in this game and I should say that there are so many other games, worth of trying out than this. Friday the 13th is a dead game, but on the same principle, and even though It's dead, I still prefer it than this..thing.. But of course you can buy this game on sale for 7 bucks, but still not worth it at all. Boring sound and cringe gameplay. Not fun - Cringe game.

Un juego que cuando lo comencÃ© a ver desde la biblioteca prestada de un amigo para nada me atraÃ­a.  Lo dejÃ© de jugar y a los dos meses saliÃ³ gratis en otra plataforma. En este momento fue mÃ¡s intenso dÃ­a a dÃ­a, combinar perks, probar personajes, mecanicas, mapas llevandolo a ser cada vez mÃ¡s entretenido. Llegado el punto, decidÃ­ comprarmelo en esta plataforma para disfrutar del sistema de recompensas, pagos, etc etc.. Hoy con casi 550 horas (y solo casi 100 en steam), puede decir que es uno de los mejores juegos que juguÃ©. 

Pros:
- Muy bueno para jugar con amigos, ademÃ¡s de entretenerte y jugar coordinado, sabes que no vas a ir con gente que te va a trollear la partida dejandose morir o desconectandose
- Tiene un sistema muy variado de perks, que pueden hacerte desempeÃ±ar el rol que desees durante el juego
- Tiene licencias de personajes de juegos y peliculas, lo que lo hace mÃ¡s llamativo a la hora de jugar con tus personajes favoritos
- Su crossplay lleva a cabo que puedas jugar con gente de consola

Contras:
- Tiene un sistema de penalizaciÃ³n malo ya que habiendo gente trolleado la partida (dejandose morir a proposito) no recibe una sanciÃ³n, por mÃ¡s que se lo reporte, ese reporte queda en el aire. 
- Siguiendo con la misma tematica la gente que se desconecta se pone un timer para entrar a la partida. SerÃ­a bueno que se pueda detectar cuando una persona sufre una desconexiÃ³n por insuficiencia de internet a que cuando cierra el juego, asi evitarÃ­amos penalizar a gente que no corresponde.
- La comunidad, tanto killers como survis tienden ser toxicos/abusivos. (he llegado a terminar partidas y sacar el chat para no leer).
- Hay muchos hackers dando vuelta, tanto en publicas como a  nivel competitivo, estarÃ­a bueno que se pudiera combatir esto con mayor eficacia.
- SerÃ­a genial clasificar a los usuarios con su idioma asÃ­ poder creer un canal de voz.

*Nota: no voy a hacer referencia al genrush ni tampoco al tuneleo/campeo porque en breve se viene un nuevo parche que en teorÃ­a viene a corregir esto.


A dÃ­a de la fecha, como dije, es uno de los mejores juegos que juguÃ© y el que mÃ¡s horas juguÃ©.
ValoraciÃ³n: 8,5
Very fun to play, with or without friends.
